ComicInfo.Summary:
Flashback as Shadowpax tells the tale of Deathboy to the newest members of the Teen Machine. The Freedom Machine must face their toughest foe, Deathboy, the boy who could disintegrate anything in his sight. Many people die...how will they ultimately stop him?!
